#
# Stage poles for the Pacific plate relative to
# the hotspots.  From Duncan, R.A, & D. Clague, 1985,
# Pacific plate motion recorded by linear volcanic
# chains, in: A.E.M. Nairn, F.G. Stehli, S. Uyeda (eds),
# The Ocean Basins and Margins, Vol. 7A, Plenum,
# New York, pp. 89-121.
#
# Time in Ma, angles in degrees
# lon	lat	tstart	tend	ccw-angle
165	85	150	100	24.0
284	36	100	74	15.0
265	22	74	65	7.5
253	17	65	42	14.0
285	68	42	0	34.0
